calculations.name: Fixed Specials
calculations.tableau_expression: { FIXED [RpDate],[isin]: MAX(IF [Is specials ?]= "Specials" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) }

calculation_context.Expression: { FIXED [RpDate],[isin]: MAX(IF [Is specials ?]= "Specials" THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) }

calculated_fields.Is specials ?: IF [Coll Spread] > [Parameters].[Specials spread] THEN "Specials" ELSE "GC" END
